exceptions.exn: In environment lt : list (list bool * list bool) n := 4 : nat s := pos0 : pos 4 h := pos1 : pos 4 l := pos2 : pos 4 a := pos3 : pos 4 Hsa : s <> a contra : s = h Unable to unify "s = h" with "s = a".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
lt: list (list bool * list bool)
n: nat
s: pos 4
h: pos 4
l: pos 4
a: pos 4
Hsa: s <> a

Goal:
s <> h

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Notation pos := Fin.t
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Fin.weak : forall p : nat, (pos ?m -> pos ?n) -> pos (p + ?m) -> pos (p + ?n) where ?m : [lt : list (list bool * list bool) n := 4 : nat s := pos0 : pos 4 h := pos1 : pos 4 l := pos2 : pos 4 a := pos3 : pos 4 Hsa : s <> a |- nat] ?n : [lt : list (list bool * list bool) n := 4 : nat s := pos0 : pos 4 h := pos1 : pos 4 l := pos2 : pos 4 a := pos3 : pos 4 Hsa : s <> a |- nat]
Fin.L_R : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [lt : list (list bool * list bool) n := 4 : nat s := pos0 : pos 4 h := pos1 : pos 4 l := pos2 : pos 4 a := pos3 : pos 4 Hsa : s <> a |- nat]
Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : pos ?n, pos_nxt x = pos_nxt y -> x = y where ?n : [lt : list (list bool * list bool) n := 4 : nat s := pos0 : pos 4 h := pos1 : pos 4 l := pos2 : pos 4 a := pos3 : pos 4 Hsa : s <> a |- nat]
main_loop_ko_spec : forall (n : nat) (s a h l : pos n), s <> a -> s <> h -> s <> l -> a <> h -> a <> l -> h <> l -> forall (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) (i p : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ln : list nat) (lc : list bool), v#>h = nil -> v#>l = nil -> v#>a = nil -> v#>s = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc -> (Exists (fun x : nat => length lt <= x) ln \/ Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln /\ (exists k : nat, lc = list_repeat Zero (S k))) \/ Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln /\ lc = nil /\ (let (hh, ll) := tile_concat ln lt in hh <> ll) -> (i, main_loop s a h l lt i p) // (i, v) -> > (i, v[(list_bool_next (v#>s))/s])
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [lt : list (list bool * list bool) n := 4 : nat s := pos0 : pos 4 h := pos1 : pos 4 l := pos2 : pos 4 a := pos3 : pos 4 Hsa : s <> a |- nat]
bsm_utils.HP1 : forall (n : nat) (s a h l : pos n), s <> a -> s <> h -> s <> l -> a <> h -> a <> l -> h <> l -> forall (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) (i p : nat) (x : vec (list bool) n), x#>h = nil /\ x#>l = nil /\ x#>a = nil ->...-> > (i, x[(list_bool_next (x#>s))/s]) /\ x[(list_bool_next (x#>s))/s]#>h = nil /\ x[(list_bool_next (x#>s))/s]#>l = nil /\ x[(list_bool_next (x#>s))/s]#>a = nil
Fin.caseS' : forall (p : pos (S ?n)) (P : pos (S ?n) -> Type), P pos0 -> (forall p0 : pos ?n, P (pos_nxt p0)) -> P p where ?n : [lt : list (list bool * list bool) n := 4 : nat s := pos0 : pos 4 h := pos1 : pos 4 l := pos2 : pos 4 a := pos3 : pos 4 Hsa : s <> a |- nat]
VectorDef.caseS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, vec ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall (h0 : ?A) (n0 : nat) (t : vec ?A n0), P n0 (h0 ## t)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [lt : list (list bool * list bool) n := 4 : nat s := pos0 : pos 4 h := pos1 : pos 4 l := pos2 : pos 4 a := pos3 : pos 4 Hsa : s <> a |- Type]
bsm_utils.full_dec_spec_rec1 : forall (n : nat) (c h l : pos n), c <> h -> c <> l -> h <> l -> forall (p q i : nat) (ln : list nat) (lc : list bool) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc -> Exists (fun x : nat => length lt <= x) ln -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> c -> z <> h -> z <> l -> v#>z = w#>z)
bsm_utils.full_dec_spec_rec2 : forall (n : nat) (c h l : pos n), c <> h -> forall (p q i k : nat) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_repeat Zero (S k) -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> c -> z <> h -> z <> l -> v#>z = w#>z)
bsm_utils.full_dec_start_spec_1 : forall (n : nat) (c h l : pos n), c <> h -> forall (p q i : nat) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c <> nil -> (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (5 + i, v)
full_decoder_ko_spec : forall (n : nat) (c h l : pos n), c <> h -> c <> l -> h <> l -> forall (p q i : nat) (ln : list nat) (lc : list bool) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc -> Exists (fun x : nat => length lt <= x) ln \/ Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln /\ (exists k : nat, lc = list_repeat Zero (S k)) -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> c -> z <> h -> z <> l -> v#>z = w#>z)
bsm_utils.full_dec_spec_rec : forall (n : nat) (c h l : pos n), c <> h -> c <> l -> h <> l -> forall (p q i : nat) (ln : list nat) (lc : list bool) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc -> Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln -> let (hh, ll) := tile_concat ln lt in (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (i, v[lc/c][(hh ++ v#>h)/h][(ll ++ v#>l)/l])
length_full_decoder = fun ll : list (list bool * list bool) => 5 + length_decoder ll : list (list bool * list bool) -> nat Arguments length_full_decoder _%list_scope
main_loop : forall n : nat, pos n -> pos n -> pos n -> pos n -> list (list bool * list bool) -> nat -> nat -> list (bsm_instr n)
tile_concat = fix tile_concat (ln : list nat) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) {struct ln} : list bool * list bool := match ln with | nil => (nil, nil) | x :: ln0 => let (th, tl) := nth x lt (nil, nil) in let (hh, ll) := tile_concat ln0 lt in (hh ++ th, ll ++ tl) end : list nat -> list (list bool * list bool) -> list bool * list bool Arguments tile_concat (_ _)%list_scope
full_decoder : forall n : nat, pos n -> pos n -> pos n -> nat -> nat -> nat -> list (list bool * list bool) -> list (bsm_instr n)
decoder : forall n : nat, pos n -> pos n -> pos n -> nat -> nat -> nat -> list (list bool * list bool) -> list (bsm_instr n)
list_bool_next = let list_bool_next_def := fun l : list bool => let s := list_bool_choose_sym l in match s with | inl (existT _ k (exist _ tl H)) => eq_rec_r (fun l0 : list bool => {m : list bool | list_bool_succ l0 m}) (exist (fun m : list bool => list_bool_succ (list_repeat One k ++ Zero :: tl) m) (list_repeat Zero k ++ One :: tl) (in_lbs_0 k tl)) H | inr (exist _ k H) => eq_rec_r (fun l0 : list bool => {m : list bool | list_bool_succ l0 m}) (exist (fun m : list bool => list_bool_succ (list_repeat One k) m) (list_repeat Zero (S k)) (in_lbs_1 k)) H end in fun l : list bool => proj1_sig (list_bool_next_def l) : list bool -> list bool Arguments list_bool_next _%list_scope
Nat.pow_nonzero : forall a b : nat, a <> 0 -> a ^ b <> 0
list_bool_succ_neq : forall l m : list bool, list_bool_succ l m -> l <> m
list_bool_dec : forall l m : list bool, {l = m} + {l <> m}
Nat.log2_iter_spec : forall k p q r : nat, 2 ^ S p = q + S r -> r < 2 ^ p -> let s := Nat.log2_iter k p q r in 2 ^ s <= k + q < 2 ^ S s
Nat.div_0_l : forall a : nat, a <> 0 -> 0 / a = 0
Nat.div_small_iff : forall a b : nat, b <> 0 -> a / b = 0 < -> a < b
bsm_compute_POP_1 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = One :: ll -> P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
pm_lift = fun (m n : nat) (r : pos_map m n) (p : pos (S m)) => let s := pos_S_inv p in match s with | inl _ => pos0 | inr (exist _ p0 _) => pos_nxt (r p0) end : forall m n : nat, pos_map m n -> pos_map (S m) (S n) Arguments pm_lift {m n}%nat_scope _ _ /
bsm_compute_PUSH : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (b : bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, PUSH x b :: nil) <sc P -> P // (1 + i, v[(b :: v#>x)/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
pos_eq_dec : forall (n : nat) (x y : pos n), {x = y} + {x <> y}
ZMicromega.ZTautoChecker = fun (f : Tauto.BFormula (RingMicromega.Formula BinNums.Z)) (w : list ZMicromega.ZArithProof) => Tauto.tauto_checker ZMicromega.Zunsat ZMicromega.Zdeduce ZMicromega.normalise ZMicromega.negate (fun cl : list (RingMicromega.NFormula BinNums.Z * unit) => ZMicromega.ZChecker (map fst cl)) f w : Tauto.BFormula (RingMicromega.Formula BinNums.Z) -> list ZMicromega.ZArithProof -> bool Arguments ZMicromega.ZTautoChecker _ _%list_scope
list_nat_bool = fix list_nat_bool (ln : list nat) : list bool := match ln with | nil => nil | x :: ll => list_repeat Zero x ++ One :: list_nat_bool ll end : list nat -> list bool Arguments list_nat_bool _%list_scope
list_bool_valid = fun (k : nat) (lb : list bool) (ln : list nat) => lb = list_nat_bool ln /\ Forall (fun x : nat => x < k) ln : nat -> list bool -> list nat -> Prop Arguments list_bool_valid _%nat_scope (_ _)%list_scope
vec_change_neq : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X n) (p q : pos n) (x : X), p <> q -> v[x/p]#>q = v#>q
list_bool_invalid = fun (k : nat) (lb : list bool) (ln : list nat) => exists lc : list bool, lb = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc /\ (Exists (fun x : nat => k <= x) ln \/ Forall (fun x : nat => x < k) ln /\ (exists p : nat, lc = list_repeat Zero (S p))) : nat -> list bool -> list nat -> Prop Arguments list_bool_invalid _%nat_scope (_ _)%list_scope
sss_compute : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type), (instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) -> nat * list instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop
subcode = fun (X : Type) (P : code X) (Q : nat * list X) => let (i, li) := P in let (n, code) := Q in exists l r : list X, code = l ++ li ++ r /\ i = n + length l : forall X : Type, code X -> nat * list X -> Prop Arguments subcode {X}%type_scope _ _ /
BinInt.Z.le = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y <> Gt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.le (_ _)%Z_scope
sss_steps_0 : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (st1 st2 : nat * data), st1 = st2 -> sss_steps one_step P 0 st1 st2
Inductive bsm_sss (n : nat) : bsm_instr n -> bsm_state n -> bsm_state n ->...-> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (1 + i, v[ll/x]) | in_bsm_sss_push : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (b : bool) (v : vec (list bool) n), bsm_sss (PUSH x b) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(b :: v#>x)/x]) Arguments bsm_sss [n]%nat_scope Arguments in_bsm_sss_pop_E [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments in_bsm_sss_pop_0 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope _ [ll]%list_scope Arguments in_bsm_sss_pop_1 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope _ [ll]%list_scope Arguments in_bsm_sss_push [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%bool_scope
pow2_dec_uniq : forall p a q b : nat, pow2 p * (2 * a + 1) = pow2 q * (2 * b + 1) -> p = q /\ a = b
